resources.string: \"Yaroslavna. Eclipse\" ballet on the second stage of Mariinskii Opera house
Cheese Weekend Cheese Festival at Dolgozernoye

On February 15 and 16, all cheese lovers will once again gather in the Dolgozeryny shopping mall, because it is where the Cheese Weekend will take place - these are two days of tasting farm products in an exciting festival format.
Boris Tishchenko’s ballet based on The Tale of Igor’s Regiment, choreographed by Vladimir Barnabas.
4600 rub. per group up to 4 people
A photo walk through the iconic non-tourist places of the city on the Neva, allowing you to feel the local flavor.
Excursion \"Secret Petersburg: a walk with the photographer\"

The roofs offer breathtaking views of the main attractions of the Northern capital. You can admire the panorama of the city and evaluate its architecture on the excursion \"Petersburg: a view from above.\"

7 Spice is an Indian street food with an open kitchen, exciting flavors and a modern, minimalist design. There are no tusks of an elephant or a maharaja diamond, but there is a spiritual atmosphere, a bright interior and dishes from brand chef Jimmy Singh.
Feel yourself in an old German fairy tale without leaving the region. There will be in St. Petersburg a house stylized as a Bavarian suburb, and a beer garden, and a small author\'s brewery.

The reconstructed agricultural market is now a newly designed fresh market, where for customers there are departments with goods from almost all corners of the world. This type of market destroys all ideas about the familiar concept of “market” - now it is a modern conceptual platform where you can always get to know something new and not worry about the quality of the purchased goods.
Liningradskaya region, Mendsary city, Lesnaya st., forester\'s house
A picturesque reindeer farm hidden in the forest invites guests and residents of the Northern capital to get acquainted with the amazing companions of Santa Claus.

In Planetarium No. 1, everyone can touch the cosmos. The dome of the new planetarium is a giant screen. The image is transmitted to him by forty powerful projectors. The special inclined design of the dome allows visitors to take impressive shots against the background of stars and galaxies.
